name: The Invincible Iron Fist Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Iron Fist is Danny Rand, but what was his father's name?
questions.explanation:
Wendell.

	Wendell Rand discovered the city of K'un-L'un and was adopted by Lord Tuan, K'un-L'un's ruler. He returned to the United States and became a businessman.

questions.text: Who teaches young Danny Rand martial arts?
questions.explanation:
Lei Kung.

	Lei Kung was also known as the Thunderer. Rand became his apprentice after displaying a desire for vengeance when his father died.

questions.text: Which other super-strong hero did Iron Fist team up with for a series than ran 125 issues?
questions.explanation:
Power Man.

	Power Man is really Luke Cage, who was initially another character in the blaxploitation genre. He later married Jessica Jones and has a child.

questions.text: Whom did Iron Fist impersonate during Civil War?
questions.explanation:
Daredevil.

	To convince the public that Matthew Murdock and Daredevil are two different people, Iron Fist dressed in a Daredevil costume and fought crime. Considering that both are martial artists, Daredevil was not a difficult role to assume.

	Due to radiation poisoning, Danny Rand contracted cancer and seemingly died, however, the real Rand hand been kidnapped and used his chi to cure the cancer.

questions.text: Which Iron Fist villain wanted the Iron Fist power for himself?
questions.explanation:
Steel Serpent.

	If you picked "Eh Chu", then gesundheit! The Steel Serpent is the exiled son of Lei Kung, the man who taught Danny Rand martial arts. Lei Kung is also known as the Thunderer.

questions.text: In "Power Man and Iron Fist", it was revealed that Danny was very well off, as opposed to the poorer Power Man.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Rand inherited his father's business and was actually quite wealthy. His father died making a second trip to K'un-L'un, and Rand's wealth bothered Power Man.

questions.text: Prior to receiving the Iron Fist, Rand plunged his fists into buckets of sand, gravel and rock.
questions.explanation:
True.

	This part of Rand's conditioning must have been very rough! Rand attained the Iron Fist power by defeating a dragon known as Shou-Lao the Undying.

questions.text: Iron Fist supports the Super Human Registration Act.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Iron Fist does not support the Super Human Registration Act. He is briefly imprisoned in the Negative Zone until he is freed by Hulkling, joining forces with Captain America.

questions.text: Danny's half-sister is named Miranda. What alter ego did she assume?
questions.explanation:
Death Sting.

	Miranda was revived by the H'ylthri, a plant-like alien race. However, to be restored to full life she had to steal the Zodiac Key. Iron Fist and S.H.I.E.L.D. tried to prevent the theft.
